landscape.title: Rotate to Landscape
landscape.text: Switch your phone to landscape mode to start recording

portrait.title: Rotate to Portrait
portrait.text: Switch your phone to portrait mode to start recording

vehicle-orbit.title: 360° Walkaround
vehicle-orbit.text: Walk slowly around the car for a complete 360° view in roughly 30–40 seconds of recording.

vehicle-surroundings.title: Clear Surroundings
vehicle-surroundings.text: Keep the space around the vehicle clear of obstacles for better capture quality.

vehicle-phone.title: Keep the Right Distance
vehicle-phone.text: Keep enough distance to ensure the vehicle is fully visible in the frame, from roof to ground.

vehicle-coverage.title: Finish When Covered
vehicle-coverage.text: When the progress bar fills, tap the ‘Record button’ again to stop.
